scripts.lint: pnpm -C apps/worker lint && pnpm -C apps/web lint
scripts.typecheck: pnpm -C apps/worker typecheck && pnpm -C apps/web typecheck
scripts.test: pnpm -C apps/worker test && pnpm -C apps/web test
scripts.dev: echo "Run in 2 terminals:" && echo "  pnpm -C apps/worker dev" && echo "  pnpm -C apps/web dev"
